content.rendered:
Dhatva

ABOUT

Dhatva was one of our first end-to-end projects which included our very first e-commerce website. This project holds a special place in our hearts. Dhatva is an organic skincare brand whose products are handcrafted, 100% organic, and are zero waste.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Communication
  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Packaging Design
  • Photography

INDUSTRY

  • Skincare - D2C

CHALLENGES

Organic &
Eye-Catching

01

One of the primary challenges was to structure the design that catches the eye but maintains an overall organic theme that was at the core of the brand structure.

02

To position the brand effectively within the saturated organic skincare industry.

03

To build a UI/UX site that would meet the standards of the industry’s top skincare brands.

04

Storyboarding and sourcing the right props and location for the photoshoot.

05

Each SKU had a different ingredient and different uses, every single label was colour coded to match the ingredients and the design was customized to each of the products.

SOLUTION

Innovation + Nature

We created custom iconography for the brand. Furthermore, we came up with some smart concepts for jute bags for handmade soaps. And seed cards to propagate the brand’s contribution to nature.

Derived
 From Nature

IDENTITY

The icon is purely made keeping the botanical and organic nature of the product in mind and is entirely hand-drawn just how purely handmade the products are.

Made To Be
 Added To Your Cart

We went ahead and created a very unique-looking website that incorporated all the brand elements to build a strong recall. We emphasized the vision behind the company and the brand story to create a connection with the audience. Further, we integrated simple checkouts, seamless flow, and automated email systems to give a push to the entire sales process.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

IMPACT

Real-World Impact

Dhatva became an instant hit amongst people. The design was received really well. The client did sales of upward of 10 lakhs in a short span of time.
